message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $13,500.  I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $11,500. This is a very competitive price for what the product offers.
I'm still interested in the product, but $11,500 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,000?
